Package ohos.hiviewdfx

Enum HiChecker.Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<HiChecker.Rule>
      • ohos.hiviewdfx.HiChecker.Rule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<HiChecker.Rule>
    Enclosing class:
    HiChecker

    public static enum HiChecker.Rule
extends Enum<HiChecker.Rule>
    Enumerates detection rules and caution rules.

    There are three rule types, as described below. The impact of applying these rules varies with the rule type.

    • Thread detection rules: CHECK is prefixed to such rules. Adding, removing, or obtaining these rules affects only the current thread.
    • Process detection rules: VM_CHECK is prefixed to such rules. Adding, removing, or obtaining these rules affects the entire process.
    • Caution rules: CAUTION_BY is prefixed to such rules. These rules specify how to inform you of cautions. Adding or removing these rules affects the current thread and the entire process. When a thread detection rule triggers a caution, the latest caution rule for the current thread applies. In contrast, when a process detection rule triggers a caution, the caution rule for the entire process applies.
    Since:
    5

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      CAUTION_BY_CRASH
      Cautions will cause the running process to crash and produce a stack trace.
      CAUTION_BY_LOG
      Cautions are logged.
      CHECK_FILE_READ
      File read operations are detected.
      CHECK_FILE_WRITE
      File write operations are detected.
      CHECK_NETWORK_ACCESS
      Network access operations are detected.
      CHECK_SLOW_PROCESS
      Time-consuming operations (slow processing) are detected.
      CHECK_VM_RELEASE_MISS
      Resources that are not released in a timely manner are detected.
